client

The client module is the entry point for our SDK. It holds a Promise-based authentication method (connect) as well as allowing for raw use of the resources (without authentication).

Source:
  • client/index.js, line 1

Methods

(inner) connect(authentication) → {Promise}

Returns a version of client with authentication data binded to the resource requests.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
authentication Object
Source:
  • client/index.js, line 53
Returns:

A Promise that resolves to a client with authentication data binded

Type
Promise
Example
// API Key Authentication
pagarme.client.connect({ apiKey: 'ak_test_y7jk294ynbzf93' })

// Encryption Key Authentication
pagarme.client.connect({ encryptionKey: 'ek_test_y7jk294ynbzf93' })

// Login Authentication
pagarme.client.connect({ email: 'user@email.com', password: '123456' })

Documentation generated at Sun Apr 02 2017 21:34:30 GMT-0300 (-03)
